column4: I am very new to ubuntu I have made the cd an was installing it to my computer and wanted to partition my disc and got an error and was unable to do it.  My question is if i complete the install will it work?

I was thinking of using the entire disc and letting my windows go bye bye.. i just wanted to make sure that it works and that i dont have too many bugs to work out. So, why does it ask me if i want to open up in windows or ubuntu when i turn on my computer now
So you can still use windows if you want to?
If you have plenty of disk space there is no need to get rid of Windows until you are positive you won't use it again. Set Ubuntu as the default with a short timeout and you can still learn
